engine.components

Class PhysicsComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.core.EntityComponent
      • engine.components.PhysicsComponent

  • public class PhysicsComponent
extends EntityComponent
    The base class for any component that interacts with the physics engine.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String NAME
      The name of this component when attached to an entity

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhysicsComponent

        public PhysicsComponent(float velX,
                float velY)
        Creates and initializes a new physics component.
        Parameters:
        velX - The velocity of the object on X, in units per second.
        velY - The velocity of the object on Y, in units per second.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Input input,
          float delta)
        Moves the entity into a new position based on the information in the physics component.

        Updates any parameters or properties of this component based on time, user input, or other factors.

        Overrides:
        update in class EntityComponent
        Parameters:
        input - User input to be considered
        delta - The amount of time, in seconds, since the last update.

      • onCollision

        public void onCollision(PhysicsComponent other,
               float distX,
               float distY)
        Respond to a collision with another object.
        Parameters:
        other - The physics component attached to the other object
        distX - Penetration distance on X
        distY - Penetration distance on Y

      • bounce

        public void bounce(PhysicsComponent other,
          float distX,
          float distY)
        Bounce off of another object that is colliding with this.
        Parameters:
        other - The physics component attached to the other object
        distX - Penetration distance on X
        distY - Penetration distance on Y
